title: Natural history of the passions
author: Charleton, Walter, 1619-1707.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for James Magnes ...,
notes: Based on: De l'usage des passions / by J.F. Senault.
Written by Walter Charleton. Cf. BM.
Wing erroneously attributed this work to J.F. Senault.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
